name: Protein Protectors
description:
Protein Protectors

Shoot hostile microorganisms to protect your cell from disease in this co-op game.
The blue player attacks the intruders and the green player repairs the damaged organelles to try and keep the cell alive for as long as possible.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2020! See Protein Protector's page on their site here: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/protein-shooter-0
